languages.text: "Прошу вас, только не на рудники!.. Я расскажу все, что видел..."

traits.locale_text: "Прошу вас, только не на рудники!.. Я расскажу все, что видел..."

languages.text: "Please don't send me to the mines! I'll tell you everything I saw..."
languages.original_text: "Прошу вас, только не на рудники!.. Я расскажу все, что видел..."

traits.locale_text: "Please, do not send me to the mines!.. I will tell you everything I have seen..."
"Please, do not send me to the mines!.. I will tell you everything I have seen..."
"Please do not send me to the mines!.. I will tell you about everything I have seen..."
"Please do not send me to the mines!.. I will tell you about everything I have seen..."
"Please don't send me to the mines! I'll tell you everything I saw..."
"Please don't send me to the mines! I'll tell you everything I saw..."

languages.text: 「どうか鉱山送りはやめてください！…見たことを何もかも話しますから…」
languages.original_text: "Please don't send me to the mines! I'll tell you everything I saw..."

traits.locale_text: 「どうか鉱山送りはやめてください！…見たことを何もかも話しますから…」

languages.text: “请不要把我送到矿井里！我会把我看到的一切都告诉你……”
languages.original_text: "Please don't send me to the mines! I'll tell you everything I saw..."

traits.locale_text: “请不要把我送到矿井里！我会把我看到的一切都告诉你……”

languages.text: « Pitié, ne m'envoyez pas dans les mines ! Je vous dirai tout ce que j'ai vu... »
languages.original_text: "Please don't send me to the mines! I'll tell you everything I saw..."

traits.locale_text: « Pitié, ne m'envoyez pas dans les mines ! Je vous dirai tout ce que j'ai vu... »

languages.text: «¡No me mandéis a las minas, por favor! Os contaré todo lo que he visto...».
languages.original_text: "Please don't send me to the mines! I'll tell you everything I saw..."

traits.locale_text: «¡No me mandéis a las minas, por favor! Os contaré todo lo que he visto...».

languages.text: "Bitte schickt mich nicht in die Minen! Ich sage Euch alles, was ich gesehen habe ..."
languages.original_text: "Please don't send me to the mines! I'll tell you everything I saw..."

traits.locale_text: "Bitte schickt mich nicht in die Minen! Ich sage Euch alles, was ich gesehen habe ..."

languages.text: "Ne olur beni madenlere göndermeyin! Gördüklerimi teker teker anlatacağım..."
languages.original_text: "Please don't send me to the mines! I'll tell you everything I saw..."

traits.locale_text: "Ne olur beni madenlere göndermeyin! Gördüklerimi teker teker anlatacağım..."
